title: I'm lvl 30 and well into ranked but still can't post on certain boards due to level restrictions?
body: Not sure if anyone else is having this issue.. this is one of the few boards I can post on without the restriction.

replies.body: This issue often happens if you hadn't used the Boards in quite a while. A discussion post such as this will force a sync and update your profile, which it has. You should be good to go now!
